sentence.Network_en: The Chadha opinion has been severely criticized as formalistic.

sentence.Network_en: The discussion was brisk; there was no time for either banter or formalistic positions.
sentence.Network_cn: 讨论是紧凑的, 没有时间开玩笑或者说空话.

sentence.Network_en: To the State Department, its preeminence, however hollow and formalistic, was a crucial symbol.
sentence.Network_cn: 对国务院来说, 它的优势地位, 不管是多么空洞和形式主义的, 都是一个重要的象征.

list.abs: to keep on eating , to keep on sleeping , to keep on fighting heroically all the way to the Yalu a stop -- these are subjectivist and formalist illusions , not realities of life .吃饭就一直吃下去，睡觉就一直睡下去，英勇战斗就一直打到鸭绿江，这是主观主义和形式主义的幻想，在实际生活里是不存在的。

auth_sentence.content: "My main concern is to get rid of the formalistic aspect of classical dance," the Russian says.
